debug.usage: ğŸ› Debug Mode Management Available commands: /debug on [level] - Enable debug mode /debug off - Disable debug mode /debug status - Show current status Debug levels: 1 - Only owners see debug messages 2 - Owners and admins see debug messages 3 - Everyone sees debug messages Debug mode shows error messages and access attempts that are normally hidden.
